Sentences: このあたりでは、4月から5月にかけていろいろな花が咲く。
Translation: In this area, various flowers bloom during April and May.

Sentences: 台風の影響で、昨夜から今朝にかけて、激しい雨が降り続いた。
Translation: Due to the typhoon, it rained heavily from last night to this morning.

Sentences: この植物は九州北部から中部にかけて見られる。
Translation: This plant is found in northern and central Kyushu.

Sentences: ガス爆発で、彼は肩から腰にかけて大やけどを負った。
Translation: The gas explosion left him with severe burns on his shoulders and lower back.

Sentences: 数学の答案は間違いだらけだった。
Translation: His math papers were full of mistakes.

Sentences: 苦労した祖父の手は固くてしわだらけだ。
Translation: My grandfather's hands were stiff and wrinkled from his hard work.

Sentences: 山頂までの道は石ころだらけだ。
Translation: The road to the top of the mountain was covered with stones.

Sentences: 父の部へ屋やは本だらけで足の踏ふみ場ばもない。
Translation: My father's clubhouse was so full of books that there was nowhere to step.

Sentences: 仕事が早く済んだのは、友達が手伝ってくれたおかげだ。
Translation: I was able to get the work done quickly thanks to the help of my friends.

Sentences: しら髪が が少ないおかげで若く見られることが多い。
Translation: I often look younger because I have fewer white hairs.

Sentences: 医療技術の進歩のおかげで平均寿命が伸びた。
Translation: Thanks to advances in medical technology, life expectancy has increased.

Sentences: 彼の言うことを信じたおかげでひどい目にあった。
Translation: I got into a terrible mess because I believed what he said.
